messages.subject: Very OT, ...
messages.msgSnippet: ... but something you should be aware of.  If you are at all invested in the stock market (and most are nowadays due to 401k and IRA accounts and the like),
messages.messageBody:
... but something you should be aware of. If you are at all invested
in the stock market (and most are nowadays due to 401k and IRA
accounts and the like), you should be aware of the fraud perpetrated
at the highest levels in the equity markets. You may have recently
heard of Gary Aguirre, a Securities and Exchange Commission
investigator who had evidence of insider trading at Pequot Capital
Management, a large hedge fund. In his pursuit of the investigation,
he asked to subpoena the former Pequot CEO who was in charge during
the possible malfeasance. But this person, John Mack, is a personal
friend of, and large campaign contributor to, The Prez. And so the
insider trading investigation was terminated without explanation by
the SEC executives, and Mr. Aguirre was summarily fired, also without
explanation, and only eleven days after having received a glowing
performance evaluation and substantial salary raise. I don't wish to
turn this board into a political rant'n'rave wastepit, and so will say
no more here. Nor do I encourage anyone else to respond here. I only
want to get the word out and perhaps stimulate others to get hot on
this fraud issue and perhaps address it in better suited venues. This
incredible corruption is not a Democrat vs. Republican dynamic, the
politicians are all in it, save a few such as Rep. Ron Paul of Texas
and Senator Tom Coburn of Oklahoma. Otherwise, they mostly all
provide political cover for the large corporations and Wall Street
firms raping the individual investors. Here is the link to Mr.
Aguirre's testimony today to the Senate Committee on the Judiciary.
Lengthy read, but well worthwhile. Whether you determine to do
something or just close your eyes, so be it (but no return rants here,
please).

http://judiciary.senate.gov/testimony.cfm?id=1972&wit_id=5485

NC :o(
